titleStmt.title: Antichrist in man the Quakers Idol. Or a faithfull discovery of their ways and opinions by an eye and ear-witness thereof. Together with an answer and confutation of some dangerous and damnable doctrines justified, in a paper sent by them unto me: as also one of them taken with a lie in his mouth before the magistrates. / By Joshuah Miller, a servant of Christ in the work of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Miller, Joshua, 17th cent.

titleStmt.title: Antichrist in man the Quakers Idol. Or a faithfull discovery of their ways and opinions by an eye and ear-witness thereof. Together with an answer and confutation of some dangerous and damnable doctrines justified, in a paper sent by them unto me: as also one of them taken with a lie in his mouth before the magistrates. / By Joshuah Miller, a servant of Christ in the work of the Gospel.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Macock, for L. Lloyd, and are to be sold at his shop, at the sign of the Castle in Corn-hil,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
